== Perumbaikad (CT) (628174) ==

Perumbaikad (CT) is a town in the [[Kottayam]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 14.04 sq. km. and harbouring 10577 households with total population of 42839 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 4 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 140 km. Male population is 20807 and female population is 22032. Scheduled Caste population is 2563 and Scheduled Tribes population is 156. Census Location Code of the town is 628174<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 47 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 67 km. Railway station is at Kottayam at a distance of 3 km.
